item.description:
This will be the very first Meetup for The Worcester Spanish Language Meetup Group!

We'll use the time to get to know each other, talk about being Spanish Speakers, and discuss what we want out of our Meetups.

Hola, lets meet and get to know each other and have a great Spanish conversation. Hope to see all of you!!

group.name: The Worcester Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: The Worcester Spanish Language April Meetup
